DOC.detailed_description: TAK-085 oral capsule medicine license Takeda Pharmaceutical Company Ltd. TAK-085 contain omega-3 fatty acid ethyl ( mainly , ethyl eicosapentaenoate ( EPA-E ) ethyl docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA-E ) ) . This phase 3 , double-blind , randomize study evaluate efficacy safety TAK-085 compare EPA-E participant hypertriglyceridemia undergo lifestyle modification . The study period total 20 week , comprise 8- week screen period 12 week treatment .
